points.title: You must create an account to use this service

case.title: You must create an account to use this service
case.localized_title: Vous devez créer un compte pour utiliser ce service
case.description: You must provide the service with your information in order to use it

points.title: This service can license user content to third parties
points.analysis: "You grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license"

case.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service peut concéder des licences sur le contenu des utilisateurs à des tiers
case.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time

case.title: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
case.localized_title: Ce service fournit des archives de leurs conditions d'utilisation afin que les changements puissent être consultés au fil du temps.
case.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.

points.title: The service warns you of the potential consequences related to third-party access

case.title: You are warned of the potential consequences related to third-party access
case.localized_title: Le service vous avertit des conséquences potentielles liées à l'accès des tiers
case.description: This is different from disclaiming liability for external links, which is handled by the "This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites" case.

points.title: You maintain ownership of your data

case.title: You maintain ownership of your content
case.localized_title: Vous restez propriétaire de vos données
case.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

points.title: This service does not sell your personal data

case.title: Your personal data is not sold
case.localized_title: Ce service ne vend pas vos données personnelles
case.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: You can choose with whom you share content

case.title: You can choose with whom you share content
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez choisir avec qui vous partagez votre contenu
case.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.

points.title: The service may collect extra data about you through promotions

case.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
case.localized_title: Le service peut collecter des données supplémentaires vous concernant par le biais de promotions
case.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

case.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
case.localized_title: Le service est fourni "en l'état" et doit être utilisé aux seuls risques des utilisateurs.
case.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.analysis: "You grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license"

case.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
case.localized_title: Le service dispose d'une utilisation non exclusive de votre contenu
case.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

points.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality
points.analysis: "STRAVA AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT: [...] (d) THE QUALITY OF ANY PRODUCTS, SERVICES, INFORMATION OR OTHER MATERIAL PURCHASED OR OBTAINED BY YOU THROUGH THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS."

case.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
case.localized_title: Ce service ne donne aucune garantie de qualité
case.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

points.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
points.analysis: "STRAVA AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT: [...] (e) ANY ERRORS IN THE SERVICES WILL BE CORRECTED."

case.title: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas que les erreurs logicielles seront corrigées
case.description: Users agree to use the service and its software as provided and accept that any errors within that software may not be corrected.

points.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

case.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
case.localized_title: Ce service interdit aux utilisateurs de tenter d'obtenir un accès non autorisé à d'autres systèmes informatiques
case.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.

points.title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Le "spidering" ou "crawling" n'est pas autorisé.

points.title: Prohibits the posting of pornographic content
points.analysis: "You may not use the Services, or assist or encourage any other party, to engage in any of the following Prohibited Activities:[...] Publishing, transmitting, distributing or storing content, material, information or data that: (1) is [...] obscene"

case.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
case.localized_title: Interdit l'affichage de contenu pornographique
case.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

points.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

case.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
case.localized_title: Ce service ne cautionne aucune idée contenue dans les contenus générés par les utilisateurs.

points.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
points.analysis: "STRAVA AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT: [...] (b) YOUR CONTENT WILL BE AVAILABLE OR THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE OR ERROR-FREE."

case.title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
case.localized_title: Le fournisseur de services ne garantit pas un service ininterrompu, opportun, sûr ou exempt d'erreurs.
case.description: The service provider expressly does not claim to provide uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service.

points.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
points.analysis: "STRAVA AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES, AFFILIATES, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, PARTNERS AND LICENSORS MAKE NO WARRANTY THAT: [...] (c) THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THE SERVICE WILL BE ACCURATE OR RELIABLE."

case.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
case.localized_title: Le service ne garantit pas l'exactitude ou la fiabilité des informations fournies
case.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $50

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur ou à 50 $.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: Provides instructions on how to submit a copyright claim

case.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
case.localized_title: Fournit des instructions sur la manière de soumettre une demande de droits d'auteur
case.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.

points.title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
points.analysis: "You may not use the Services, or assist or encourage any other party, to engage in any of the following Prohibited Activities: [...] Publishing, transmitting, distributing or storing content, material, information or data that: [...] is [...]defamatory, threatening, harassing, abusive, or hateful or that advocates violence."

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination

case.title: Defend, indemnify, hold harmless; survives termination
case.localized_title: défendre, indemniser, dégager de toute responsabilité ; survit à la résiliation

points.title: This service forces users into binding arbitration in the case of disputes for users outside the EU

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Ce service oblige les utilisateurs à recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige pour les utilisateurs situés en dehors de l'UE.
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

case.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs disposent d'un délai réduit pour intenter une action en justice contre le service
case.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.

points.title: The service can suspend your account for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
case.localized_title: Le service peut suspendre votre compte pour plusieurs raisons

points.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

case.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
case.localized_title: Ils peuvent cesser de fournir le service à tout moment
case.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Ce service utilise des cookies de tiers pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: This service requires first-party cookies

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Ce service nécessite des cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

case.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
case.localized_title: La nullité d'une partie des conditions d'utilisation n'entraîne pas la nullité de la partie restante
case.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

points.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

case.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
case.localized_title: Le fait de ne pas appliquer une disposition des conditions d'utilisation ne constitue pas une renonciation à cette disposition.
case.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

points.title: Your personal data is given to third parties

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont communiquées à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
points.analysis: "The information stored in those files includes IP addresses, browser type, internet service provider (ISP), referring/exit pages, platform type, date/time stamp, and number of clicks. "

case.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
case.localized_title: Ce service permet de savoir quelle page web vous a renvoyé vers lui
case.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Traçage via des cookies de tiers à des fins publicitaires
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers peuvent être impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent aux attentes ou aux exigences des utilisateurs
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: This service collects your IP address, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille votre adresse IP, qui peut être utilisée pour déterminer votre emplacement approximatif.

points.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future
points.analysis: "You grant us a [...] license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, publicly perform and display any Content and any name, username or likeness that you post on or in connection with the Services in all media formats and channels now known or later developed without compensation to you."

case.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
case.localized_title: Le service peut distribuer votre contenu par le biais de tous les médias connus aujourd'hui ou à l'avenir.

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

case.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
case.localized_title: Vous devez signaler au service toute utilisation non autorisée de votre compte ou toute violation de la sécurité
case.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection (California, USA)

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
case.localized_title: Le tribunal qui régit les conditions est situé dans une juridiction plus favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs (Californie, États-Unis).
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

case.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
case.localized_title: Il est conseillé aux utilisateurs de consulter régulièrement les conditions d'utilisation, bien qu'en cas de changements importants, le service en informera les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

points.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
points.analysis: "You may not use the Services, or assist or encourage any other party, to engage in any of the following Prohibited Activities:[...] Publishing, transmitting, distributing or storing content, material, information or data that: (1) is illegal"

case.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs s'engagent à ne pas utiliser le service à des fins illégales
case.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.

points.title: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users

case.title: Your identity is used in ads that are shown to other users
case.localized_title: Votre identité est utilisée dans les publicités diffusées à d'autres utilisateurs.
case.description:
Ads shown to other users may include a reference to you as an implied endorsement.
Might give away information about your own personal lifestyle to strangers.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans préavis et sans raison.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties
points.analysis: Strava may share personal data with third parties "including" (and therefore not limited) with law enforcement, if the disclosure is "allowed by the law".

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service peut communiquer vos informations personnelles à des tiers
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.

case.title: You agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous êtes seul responsable des réclamations faites à l'encontre du service et acceptez d'indemniser et de dégager de toute responsabilité le service.
case.description:
You are responsible for your use of the service. If a claim arises related to that use, you agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless.
If users are also required to defend the service, see Case 146 instead.
